# Art

Under Construction

This will later be ordered into a learning path, similar to programming

Still outlining subjects.

# Art design

Designing to be easier to draw.

  • Avoid lots of secondary motion, scarfs capes hair
  • Avoid complex shapes or patterns

    Under Construction

Ask about this

:::

Designing to be easier to pose.

  • Avoid stubby limbs (?)
  • Avoid capes and silhouette noise

# Visual

Use of references

# Still

# Fundamental

Form - draw what you see

Arc

# Pixel art specific

Jaggies etc

Avoid small patterns, like single pixel stripes. Single pixel patterns or details end up looking noisy. Instead, use larger shapes and suggest the pattern

exercises https://saint11.org/blog/pixel-art-tutorials/

# Fighting game / Rivals specific

Communication in posing. Silhouettes.

Very fast movements between keys, especially into an attack.

Skullgirls GCD animation talk (opens new window) Starry Eyes example (opens new window)

# Style

Proportion. Size. Mixels

Palette and Lighting Hue shifting 3-4 Primary colors. 2 shades per color - main and dark. Third shade may be needed for shiny materials or deep creases.
